question: Which country was elected for the first time to the UNESCOÂ World Heritage Committee?
explanation:
Saudi Arabia was elected to the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization\'s (UNESCO) World Heritage Committee for the first time on 27 November 2019. The Kingdom was elected to the UN heritage body\'s executive board for the term 2019-2023.
The approval confirms Saudi Arabia\'s international status and its role in building peace and contributing effectively to the establishment of the principles of culture and science.
